name: Red Ball 6
description:
Are you a crazy fan of Red Ball 5 adventure series? Red ball 6 is designed for you!

Red Ball 6 is an exciting & interesting game perfect to keep you busy and enjoy the fun.Roll and jump the bouncing red jump ball 2 through each level and The ball 5 game is very easy to play where the player needs to ensure that the moving ball does not hit the square shapes and Animals and you keep building a high score.
You have to swipe up to jump up and swipe down to jump down with the ball hero . Whether you're looking to enjoy rolling the red ball 6 , you will absolutely enjoy playing this game. Sounds easy? There is a small twist which makes the game challenging and a lot more exciting. The ball keeps moving and the speed of the moving ball increases as the game progresses.
With a very simple user interface and easy controls, the ball game has been beautifully designed for players with all age groups. Just touch and drag on the screen to move the ball on the screen. As the player makes progress, the game becomes more challenging by increasing the speed of the pong ball.

GAME FEATURES Red Ball 6

Still looking for features that make Ball Hero jump the best among all ball games? Here are features of the game that make it incredible -
- Beautiful game graphics
- Simple game controls and easy to get started
- Obstacles of different shapes
- Different square shapes and Animals to play with
- Easy to play, even suitable for kids
- Various levels to roll the ball
- Evil bosses to beat
- Difficulty increases with the speed of moving ball

Red Ball 6 is a complete stress reliever game which is one of the most addictive and exciting game with complexity of the challenges increasing gradually. How good are you at getting your target? Prove your gaming skills and get your target to achieve maximum score. Challenge your friends and compete with them to be the champion of the Red Ball 5 . The more you play, the more you will be accustomed to respond quickly and able to play even under pressure.

Get this exciting classic game and enjoy the full-time fun. Remember! Keep the ball inside the screen. Use the controls carefully and quickly. You will love the game!

How to play:
- Use right and left arrow keys to roll the ball hero
